wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Banthorpe (born 6 February 1949) is a retired British international sprinter. He competed in the men's 200 metres at the 1968 Summer Olympics.He also represented England in the 200 metres, at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland.
